name: Kimberley Nordic Club
description: Kimberley Nordic Club is located within city limits and boasts 30 KM of groomed double track and 6.5 KM of groomed single track. The area is known for its world-class grooming and abundance of bluebird ski days. Night skiing is offered daily along a 3.3 KM lit loop. Visitors can take advantage of a comfortable day lodge and waxing hut before or aer their ski.
